Package ai

Class Summary
EvaluablePosition Extends a positions so that it can be set with an evaluation value.
Evaluator Provides a method for evaluating a game situation.
GameTreeEvaluator Evaluates a game situation by building up a game tree and examining the best possible move within the generated game tree, utilizing an alphabeta algorhithm and iterative tree search.
RandomEvaluator Does not implement a specific evaluation algorithm.
RuleBasedEvaluator Provides a quick and basic algorithm for evaluating positions.
Strategy Contains the intelligence of the computer player.
